statements: SELECT * FROM PortfolioPerformance WHERE trade_type='BUY'
SELECT symbol, trade_quantity, trade_price FROM PortfolioPerformance WHERE trade_type='SELL' ORDER BY trade_execution_date DESC
SELECT MAX(trade_quantity) AS max_quantity FROM PortfolioPerformance
SELECT MIN(trade_cost) AS min_cost FROM PortfolioPerformance WHERE trade_type='SELL'
SELECT DISTINCT symbol FROM PortfolioPerformance WHERE trade_execution_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY symbol ASC
SELECT * FROM PortfolioPerformance WHERE trade_quantity > 100 ORDER BY trade_execution_date DESC, trade_execution_time ASC;
SELECT portfolio_id, symbol, trade_type FROM PortfolioPerformance WHERE trade_cost < 500 ORDER BY trade_cost DESC;
SELECT symbol, trade_quantity, trade_price FROM PortfolioPerformance WHERE trade_type = 'Buy' AND trade_quantity >= 50 ORDER BY trade_price ASC, trade_quantity DESC;
SELECT portfolio_id, trade_execution_date, strategy_evaluation FROM PortfolioPerformance WHERE trade_price > 1000 ORDER BY trade_execution_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM PortfolioPerformance WHERE symbol LIKE 'AAPL%' AND trade_quantity > 200 ORDER BY trade_quantity DESC, trade_price ASC;
SELECT * FROM PortfolioPerformance;
SELECT strategy_name, returns FROM PortfolioPerformance ORDER BY returns DESC;
SELECT * FROM TradeExecution WHERE trade_type='BUY';
SELECT portfolio_id, trade_date, trade_symbol, trade_quantity FROM TradeExecution ORDER BY trade_date ASC;
SELECT portfolio_id, trade_symbol, trade_quantity, trade_price FROM TradeExecution WHERE trade_quantity > 100 AND trade_price < 50;
SELECT * FROM PortfolioPerformance WHERE strategy_name = 'Long-Term';
SELECT portfolio_id, date, returns FROM PortfolioPerformance WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT strategy_name, SUM(returns) AS total_returns FROM PortfolioPerformance GROUP BY strategy_name;
SELECT * FROM TradeExecution WHERE trade_type = 'Buy' ORDER BY trade_date DESC;
SELECT portfolio_id, trade_symbol, trade_quantity, trade_price FROM TradeExecution WHERE trade_price > 100 ORDER BY trade_price ASC;
SELECT * FROM portfolio_performance;
SELECT portfolio_id, strategy_name, total_returns FROM portfolio_performance WHERE total_returns > 0;
SELECT trade_action, trade_quantity FROM trade_execution ORDER BY trade_date DESC;
SELECT evaluation_id, strategy_name, performance_rank FROM strategy_evaluation WHERE success_rate >= 0.8 ORDER BY performance_rank DESC;
SELECT * FROM strategy_evaluation WHERE evaluation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM portfolio_performance ORDER BY strategy_name DESC, total_returns ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT strategy_name, backtest_date FROM portfolio_performance WHERE total_returns > 1000 AND max_drawdown < 500 ORDER BY backtest_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT portfolio_id, total_returns FROM portfolio_performance WHERE strategy_name = 'High Risk' ORDER BY total_returns DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT portfolio_id, strategy_name, backtest_date FROM portfolio_performance WHERE total_returns > 5000 AND max_drawdown < 1000 ORDER BY backtest_date ASC LIMIT 7;
SELECT trade_id, trade_date, trade_symbol, trade_action FROM trade_execution WHERE trade_price < 50 ORDER BY trade_quantity DESC, trade_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM portfolios;
SELECT portfolio_name, start_date FROM portfolios ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT portfolio_name, strategy_id, end_date FROM portfolios WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT trade_id, stock_symbol, trade_type, quantity FROM trades WHERE trade_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description FROM strategies;
SELECT * FROM portfolios WHERE strategy_id = '5e599c8a-1701-4f1b-ae93-d3ec5b93ecdd';
SELECT portfolio_id, portfolio_name, start_date FROM portfolios WHERE end_date IS NULL;
SELECT trade_id, stock_symbol, trade_type, quantity FROM trades WHERE trade_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM strategies WHERE strategy_description LIKE '%quantitative%';
SELECT result_id, performance_metric FROM backtesting_results ORDER BY performance_metric DESC;
SELECT * FROM BacktestResults;
SELECT strategy_name, start_date, end_date FROM BacktestResults;
SELECT backtest_id, performance_metrics FROM BacktestResults WHERE backtest_id = 1;
SELECT trade_id, trade_date, symbol, quantity, price FROM StrategyTrades WHERE trade_type = 'BUY';
SELECT execution_id, trade_id, execution_datetime, execution_price FROM TradeExecution ORDER BY execution_datetime DESC;
SELECT * FROM BacktestResults;
SELECT strategy_name, start_date, end_date FROM BacktestResults WHERE backtest_id = 1;
SELECT trade_id, symbol, quantity, price FROM StrategyTrades ORDER BY trade_date DESC;
SELECT execution_id, execution_datetime, execution_price, order_status FROM TradeExecution WHERE execution_price > 100;
SELECT portfolio_id, symbol, allocation_percentage FROM PortfolioAllocation WHERE portfolio_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
